name: Raising Hell
description:
Raising Hell is a casual platformer where you are the devil who is trying to escape the hell and running away from all the demons.

Your task is to successfully cross the hell path and reach the destination at the end.

CONTROLS:

USE "A" & "D" ---> TO MOVE THE PLAYER AROUND

USE "LEFT MOUSE BUTTON"->TO SHOOT FIRE BALL

USE "SPACEBAR"-> TO JUMP
